mapper.select: SELECT a.seq, a.channel_id as channelId, a.feed_cat_path as feedCatPath, a.feed_prop as feedProp, a.feed_prop_translate as feedPropTranslate, a.display_order as displayOrder, a.created, a.creater, a.modified, a.modifier FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_feed_custom_prop a WHERE a.channel_id = #{channelId} AND (a.feed_cat_path = #{feedCatPath} OR a.feed_cat_path = '0')
